title: Build audit log viewer with filters, detail drawer, retention indicator
description: Audit log per spec section 3.3 and wireframe 6.3: Table with timestamp, actor, action, resource, status columns. Filter bar (date range, user, type, search). Quick filter chips (MiFID 5yr, GDPR Events, Security, Errors). Expandable row details. Right-slide drawer showing full event JSON, related events, export options. Pagination. Retention timeline indicator (Hot/Warm/Cold/Delete).

title: Build pricing page with 3 tiers, comparison table, calculator, FAQ
description: Pricing page per spec section 3.4: Monthly/annual toggle (15% discount). 3-tier cards: Developer (Free), Business (â‚¬499/mo), Enterprise (Custom). Feature comparison table. Interactive cost calculator with sliders for rollups, nodes, txns. 6-8 FAQ accordion items. Trust badges footer.

title: Setup Next.js 14 project with shadcn/ui, Tailwind, design tokens per spec
description:
attached_molecule: pr-wisp-2cd
attached_at: 2026-01-25T11:56:13Z
dispatched_by: mayor

Create Next.js 14+ App Router project. Install shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS 3.4+. Configure design system: Primary Blue #0066FF, Gray scale, semantic colors, EU Blue #003399/Gold #FFCC00. Inter + JetBrains Mono fonts. Dark mode support with bg #0F172A. Component tokens per section 4 of spec.

title: Deacon Patrol
description: Mayor's daemon patrol loop for handling callbacks, health checks, and cleanup.

title: Build admin dashboard with KPIs, activity timeline, network grid, compliance status
description: Dashboard per spec section 3.1 and wireframe 6.1: Collapsible left sidebar (260px/64px). Top header with search, notifications, user menu, theme toggle. 4 KPI cards (Active Rollups, 24h Txns, Uptime %, Alerts) with sparklines. Activity timeline with severity colors. Network status grid with status badges. Resource utilization charts. Compliance gauges (GDPR/MiCA/DORA progress bars).

title: Build marketing homepage with hero, trust bar, value props, testimonial, CTAs
description: Homepage per spec section 3.4: Hero with outcome headline, animated dashboard illustration. Trust bar with logos. 4-card value prop grid (EU Data Sovereignty, Compliance Built-In, 5-Day Deployment, 99.99% Uptime). Tabbed product overview. Use case cards. Testimonial with photo. Compliance badge row (SOC2, ISO27001, GDPR, MiCA). Split CTA section. Full footer with newsletter.

title: Build 7-step rollup deployment wizard with EU compliance settings
description: Wizard per spec section 3.2 and wireframe 6.2: Horizontal stepper with 7 steps (Config, Network, DA Layer, Infra, Integrate, Comply, Review). Step 1: name, type (L2/L3/Validium), stack (Polygon CDK/OP Stack/etc). Step 2: gas token, block time slider, gas limit, sequencer mode. Step 3: DA provider cards with cost estimator. Step 4: region map with EU highlight. Step 5: integrations checkboxes. Step 6: EU compliance settings (data residency, audit logging, GDPR/MiCA/DORA tags). Step 7: review summary + deploy. Right-side summary panel.
